name: Damian Franciszek Pospiech
profile_summary:
Senior Software Engineer with 13+ years of experience specializing in Python and SQL, effectively implementing ETL processes and managing data modeling initiatives. Proficient in **Airflow** for orchestrating workflows and streamlining data pipelines. Expertise in building robust APIs and leveraging relational databases along with advanced techniques in data warehousing and **columnar storage**.
Well-versed in automated testing to ensure high-quality deliverables, and experienced in **Lean/Agile methodologies** to foster team collaboration and enhance product development cycles. Strong aptitude for critical thinking and problem-solving, combined with excellent communication skills and the ability to empathize and listen actively to team members and stakeholders.
Additionally, I have hands-on experience with **JavaScript/TypeScript**, **Flutter**, **React**, **Next.js**, **Vue**, and backend frameworks like **Node.js**, **FastAPI**, and **Django**, allowing for full-stack development capabilities. My background includes delivering high-performance applications across the healthcare and financial industries, with a commitment to compliance-driven development aligned with industry standards such as HIPAA, FHIR, PCI DSS, and SOC 2.
